column2: IDEA-147131 "Add Copy Subject" action to VCS history context menu

column3: As discussed in the tracker ticket, the functionality is already covered by the plain Copy action.

Btw, have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, you'll need it for future contributions.
You can download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
IDEA-147131 "Add Copy Subject" action to VCS history context menu
